title: GREAT 3BED 3BATH FOR RENT
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 1534 N Natrona St! This breathtaking 3 bedroom / 3 bathroom single family home features hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, central a/c, finished basement, a balcony, and sleek finishes throughout. Enter into the first floor living area with 2 big windows at the front and the staircase straight ahead. The straight-back floor plan is spacious and bright, and can accommodate different types of furniture set ups. Continue into your gorgeous kitchen offering 2 long rows of cabinetry above & below for ample storage space. There is tons of prep space and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances including an electric stovetop, 2 ovens, built-in overhead microwave, dishwasher, and a large refrigerator making this kitchen a chef's dream! A finished basement is available for additional living space and would serve well as a den, office, or workout room. You will also find your washer & dryer in the basement, as well as a full bathroom with a modern floating vanity and a sleek glass shower stall with detachable showerhead. Continue upstairs on the second floor to view 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The primary bedroom has incredible natural sunlight and an en suite bathroom equipped with gorgeous tiling, a vanity, medicine closet, and glass shower stall. A front porch is perfect for enjoying those warmer months - call for a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Nestled in the lovely Brewery town neighborhood of Philadelphia, just steps from the Philadelphia Zoo, Temple University, Eastern State Penitentiary, and more. Close proximity to Athletic Square Park, Boathouse Row, Lemon Hill, and Fair mount Park. Walk able to tons of public transportation options including bus routes and the trolley line. Favorite neighborhood eateries and stores include The Monkey & The Elephant, Cultivate Plant Store, Ridge Diner, Green Eggs Cafe, Holistic Jawn Food Store, and countless more! Lease Terms: Generally.

title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $620
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

title: You do not want to miss out
description:
You do not want to miss out on this bright sunlight unit with a beautiful neutral palette at independence place located right on washington square, available on august 1st. The spacious renovated two bedroom/two bathroom corner unit on washington square boasts high-end finishes everywhere you turn including quartz countertops, bosch stainless steel appliances, emtek hardware along with all custom closets. Beautiful hardwood floors throughout add to a continuous flow from the entryway to the spacious balcony and everywhere in between. The foyer leads to a generously sized living room with two walls of floor-to-ceiling windows. The gourmet kitchen overlooks the open floor plan which features a dining area and spacious living room. The master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows is a nice size with a walk-in closet and an additional bonus wall closet. Attached to the master bedroom you will find its own bathroom with a soaking tub. The second bedroom is off of the living area with yet another great size wall closet. The hall bathroom is a full bath with a stall shower. For convenience, there is a stacked washer and dryer in the private laundry room. Throughout this unit, you have thought out custom california closets, updated appliances, two new hvac units, new water heater, high-end window treatments, and extra cabinets that the sellers added for even more storage in the master bedroom. The lobby and gym is under major renovation, but do not worry as the seller has already taken care of the assessment that each unit owes. Great amenities include 24/7 doormen, separate storage space plus onsite parking. This condominium building is located on historic washington square park, with tons of restaurants, shopping, museums, public transportation and so much more. A must-see rarity for sure! All utilities are included in the rent price! No pets.
